channel.title: MSN LOCKED OUT! Help
channel.description:
Fricking msn locked me out when i changed my age so that I could signup for xbox live.. BUT I set my age to like 20 and it said I was a kid and now it wants me to prove i'm not a kid by giving them a credit card and I have one AND my mom won't give me hers (many reasons why , don't ask). It says you can verify by email but it says the page is down or something! What do I do???? If i have to make a new one that means ill loose all my contacts which i can't get some of them again.
:'( Oh and zammyking111 if you read this add skatetopia2006@hotmail.com

item.title: MSN LOCKED OUT! Help
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Wow you people kinda missed my point here… HERES A RESTATEMENT…
Okkkk. I just got xbox live so I got on my xbox to signup for a game tag. blabla bla. On xbox live for the people that don’t have it you use your msn live or hotmail account for your gamertag. First time I went to sign up it said i was’nt old anuff , so then i go and login my hotmail account and try yo change my age so that I can sign up for xbox live using that account and made a mistake and now its calling me a kid and won’t let me login.

Hopefully that clears it up cause I don’t think people knw what im saying.

Read full topic
